isis.stitle: EC-17 ANTILOCK TRACTION CONTROLLER - DIAGNOSTIC LEDS and RESET - "MOD" (Modulator) LED

svcproc.title: "MOD" (Modulator) LED
svcproc.para: This Red LED illuminates to indicate an open or short circuit in the solenoids of one of the four modulators or the wiring connecting them to the system. When indicating a fault with a modulator, this LED will be illuminated with two positioning LEDs (RHT/LFT + FRT/RER).

note.para: The MID positioning LED should not be illuminated with this LED. This LED is also used to indicate a fault with an ATR 1 or 2, AntiLock Traction Relay, solenoid. When illuminated for a traction system fault the TRC LED will also be on.
